version_description:
- Auto Sync can now be executed in the background. You can continue reading your documents while the sync engine is working quietly behind the scenes.
- Auto Sync can now be scheduled for automatic periodical execution, without having to press the Sync

- Auto Sync can now be executed in the background. You can continue reading your documents while the sync engine is working quietly behind the scenes.
- Auto Sync can now be scheduled for automatic periodical execution, without having to press the Sync

- another option of handling files from iCloud Drive - opening and annotating files without copying them into GoodReader's local storage, in addition to the existing Import option
- Touch ID - use your fingerprints to unlock the entire GoodReader app o

- another option of handling files from iCloud Drive - opening and annotating files without copying them into GoodReader's local storage, in addition to the existing Import option
- Touch ID - use your fingerprints to unlock the entire GoodReader app o

- turn PDF pages with a remote page turning device, such as AirTurn Bluetooth Page Turner, or any other compatible foot pedal, or even a standard Bluetooth keyboard. If you're a musician performing live with tons of sheet music PDFs on your iPad, this fea

- turn PDF pages with a remote page turning device, such as AirTurn Bluetooth Page Turner, or any other compatible foot pedal, or even a standard Bluetooth keyboard. If you're a musician performing live with tons of sheet music PDFs on your iPad, this fea

- iPad Pro support
- iOS 9 multitasking support - Slide Over and Split View
The "Big" update with cool new features and a brand-new design is coming next. Stay tuned...

- iPad Pro support
- iOS 9 multitasking support - Slide Over and Split View
The "Big" update with cool new features and a brand-new design is coming next. Stay tuned...

!!! Important iOS 11 Notice !!!
The outdated GoodReader 3 apps were discontinued in 2014 and replaced with the modern GoodReader 4. If you’re still using one of the older 32-bit GoodReader 3 apps, they will not work in iOS 11 which only supports 64-bit

While we're finishing our huge GoodReader 5 upgrade, here's an urgent mini-update to resolve connectivity issues some are having with Google Drive and Dropbox. Stay tuned for the free major upgrade that is to follow soon!

While we're finishing our huge GoodReader 5 upgrade, here's an urgent mini-update to resolve connectivity issues some are having with Google Drive and Dropbox. Stay tuned for the free major upgrade that is to follow soon!

- completely new UI design: everything is better, faster, easier to find, more intuitive, with a modern new look
- completely redesigned PDF viewer: much smoother scrolling, zooming, and page turning
- PDF: continuous "pageless" scrolling mode
-

New in 5.1.0:
- better handling of files sent to GoodReader from other apps, now with a choice of options - "Open in Place" or "Copy to GoodReader"
- Server connection window now has a search bar for file and folder names
- OneDrive connection: a

New in 5.1.0:
- better handling of files sent to GoodReader from other apps, now with a choice of options - "Open in Place" or "Copy to GoodReader"
- Server connection window now has a search bar for file and folder names
- OneDrive connection: a

New in 5.1.2:
- by popular request, PDF Horizontal Scroll Lock feature is back
- FIXED: an issue with unzipping some ZIP archives
- FIXED: some annotations hidden from annotation summaries for users with no Pro Pack

Earlier:
Enormous Go
